items.title: photoml
items.description: Android Image Gallery app with Machine Learning features such as Facial Recognition, OCR, Barcode and Label Detection. Built in Android Studio using Java, Glide and Firebase ML-Kit.

items.title: summarise
items.description: Gmail Extension which generates a max 3-line summary of a thread.

items.title: img-geometric-transformation
items.description: A python script to perform Geometric Transformation on Image File such as Perspective change, Zoom In/Out, Translate, Scale, Shear, Rotate and Flip.

items.title: designs
items.description: Multiple frontend website templates such as Blog, Online Store, Travel etc. built using only HTML, CSS and JS.
